mdes.slick.sui
Class Display

java.lang.Object
  mdes.slick.sui.Component
      mdes.slick.sui.Container
          mdes.slick.sui.Display
public class Display
extends Container

This acts as a top-level component which renders various SuiContainers.

Method Detail

isConsumingEvents

protected boolean isConsumingEvents()
Description copied from class: Component
Can be overridden if you wish this component's mouse dragged, pressed and released events to pass down to slick.

For example, the Display does not (by default) consume events.

Overrides:
isConsumingEvents in class Component
Returns:
true if we should consume an even on a mouse press/release of this component

reinit

public void reinit()
Adjusts the size on this display if it has changed from the context. When a GUIContext (or GameContainer) has changed its size this method should be called.

getFocusOwner

public Component getFocusOwner()
Returns the component which currently has the focus. If the current focus owner is not focusable and/or not visible, the focus owner is released and null is returned.

Returns:
the current focus owner, or null if none exists
Since:
b.0.2

render

public final void render(org.newdawn.slick.gui.GUIContext c,
                         org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
Description copied from class: Component
Called to render this component as a whole. For subclasses looking for custom rendering (outside of skins), it is suggested that you override renderComponent and disable the appearance.

Overrides:
render in class Component
Parameters:
c - The container displaying this component
g - The graphics context used to render to the display

update

public final void update(org.newdawn.slick.gui.GUIContext c,
                         int delta)
Description copied from class: Component
Updates this container and its children to the screen.

The order of updating is as follows:

  1. Update this component through updateComponent
  2. Update this component's border through updateBorder
  3. Update this component's children through updateChildren

For custom updating of the component, override renderComponent.
For cusotm updating of the border, override renderBorder.
For custom updating of the children, override renderChildren.

Overrides:
update in class Component
Parameters:
c - The container displaying this component
delta - The delta to update by
